message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking $200 for it. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $120 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $170. I believe this product will bring you a lot of value.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $170 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product. Can you meet me in the middle?
